WOlfblade::

She was glad to be back in the lab. Malice was obviously 
uncomfortable around her as his body language showed very well. Her 
systems were re-setting themselves, but it seemed to taking an 
eternity for her.  She glanced up at Malice and felt her belly turn 
upside down.  She picked up a small set of tools and started to 
finish the small touches on thier project. "Uh, by the way, erhm, 
well, thanks for your help. Back there....I mean."  She tried to hide 
her face behind the large sphere on the work bench. She wasn't sure 
why some of her circuits were acting as funny as they were. Or wny 
some of her lanugage skills went haywire a little while ago. She told 
herself she would put herself in a CR chamber when this was done and 
run a complete diognostic on herself. However, she had to admit, even 
to herself, she thought she was feeling something when she thought, 
saw or looked at Malice. She looked and found herself staring at the 
sphere as she had gotten lost in thought, She shook her head and 
returned to work. "Hope this works. I'd hate to battle this bot in 
hand to hand combat."




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice nervously chuckled as he released his hold on her waist, and 
supports her by the shoulders.  He struggled to find an excuse, but 
his tongue was tied in an amazing series of knots.  He just shut up 
and walked Wolfblade into the lab and to a chair.  He walked to the 
sphere, and turned, still nerivous and trying to sort out the 
previous moment's events.
> "Let's finish this thing, ok?"
> He looked at his partner, his nerviousness showing well, he was 
wanting a disraction, but, at the same time, felt something else.
> 
> shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> Wolfblade::
> 
> She found herself being held up by a male bot and wasn't sure what 
to 
> do. She had her hands on his chest as she looked up at him. "Ah, I, 
> uh, erhm, eh, well, this isn't what I was expecting. Eh, I mean, 
this 
> isn't what I wanted. No, No, I mean, I'm sorry. I didn't mean to, 
> uh..."  She couldn't believe her predicament. She found herself 
> actually blushing as she couldn't manage to ingage her audiable 
> functions. She started to feel scared that her mother boards were 
> melting or something. 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Malice almost instinctivly reacted.  He quickly stepped forward, 
> and his arms instantly wrapped around Wolfblade's waist.  He stood 
up 
> straight, Wolfblade in his arms against his chest.  He didn't 
speak, 
> how could he?  He wasn't sure what just happened himself.
> > 
> > shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:Wolfblade::
> > 
> > She put her arm on his shoulder and used him to balance.  She 
> > appreciated his help in waliking while her systems returned to 
> normal 
> > functioning perameters. "You were guessing? Look Malice, we both 
> know 
> > that you very, very good at what you do. So I'm not buying 
the 'I'm 
> > just guessing' bit. Anyway, as far as taking it easy, we have 
still 
> > have to deal with Unicrom when he gets closer. So let's get to 
the 
> > lab and make sure our little invention works."  She took a step 
and 
> > her legs buckled under her. She started to fall. "ACK!"
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > Malice was suprised.  He expected her to slug him in the face.  
> He 
> > stood for a moment, not moving.  
> > > <What was that?  Why did she do that?  I expected he to try to 
> kill 
> > me.>
> > > Malice pushed it aside, but it was still there, nagging the 
back 
> of 
> > his mind.  He walked over to Wolfblade and helped her to her 
feet.  
> > Although she was recovering, she still had trouble standing.  He 
> > gently held her upright, so he could look her in the optics.
> > > "You should take it easy.  I was guessing at what I was doing.  
> So 
> > take it easy, ok?"  
> > > 
> > > shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> > > Wofblade::
> > > 
> > > She had to endure hit taunting but she didn't have to like it. 
> > While 
> > > he moved her back and forth, she could feel her hands coming 
back 
> > on 
> > > line. She growled but played as thought she couldn't even move 
> her 
> > > optics if she wanted to. "You know, your good. Your very good. 
> > > However, you don't have to rub it in."  She frowned a bit and 
> > wished 
> > > her body would recover faster. She grumbled, "Great, and if I 
was 
> > > around when you and your brother were together, who knows if 
I'd 
> > > still be functioning or not. i don't think I'd survive. Not the 
> way 
> > > you mix drinks."  She kept swaying as he moved her back and 
> forth. 
> > > She felt her legs come on line. She she waited just a second to 
> run 
> > a 
> > > quick internal diognostic. She was about 50 %.  She decided to 
> use 
> > > what she had. She stood up as quickly as possible. She turned 
and 
> > > leaned on the back of the chair. She kissed Malice on the nose 
> and 
> > > then walked/hobbled/limped out towards the mess hall door. "You 
> too 
> > > can learn a few things Oh great Sarcastic One." as she walked 
out 
> > > into the hallway.  She stopped just outside the door and leaned 
> > > against the wall. "Sheesh, note to self, don't drink with that 
> bot 
> > > again," under her breath. 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
<bustercross365@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > Malice began to chuckle softly.  Then it got louder, and 
loude, 
> > > until it sounded a lot like Megatron, the Leader of the 
> > Decepticons.  
> > > One could easily confuse Malice for Megatron.  
> > > >  
> > > > He had to admit, she played her act extremly well.
> > > > "Oh you don't mean that, now do you?  You're just mad I 
caught 
> on 
> > > to you so quickly.  At least I didn't throw you into stasis 
lock 
> > and 
> > > do something bad to you."
> > > > He let loose another manical laugh, before stepping out from 
> > behind 
> > > the counter.  He stood behind Wolfblade, taking her shoulders 
in 
> > his 
> > > big hands and gently tossed her back and forth in between his 
> > hands.  
> > > > "Your a good Maximal or Maxitron or whatever, too bad you 
were 
> > not 
> > > online when me and my brother came online.  You'd be a real 
> riot!   
> > > Oh well, live and learn.  Well at least you should learned a 
> lesson 
> > > from this."

smiled

looked

> However, 
> > > you 
> > > > ever...and I mean EVER do that again, and once I can move 
again 
> > > I'll 
> > > > terminate your programs perminantely." She couldn't help but
